subject: p12530259
History: Left lower lobe lobectomy, improvement of atelectasis.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is increasing opacity in the left hemithorax, likely reflecting post-surgical changes. The right lung and the cardiac silhouette are constant in shape, the right lung remains normal.
